reviewText: This is a very beautiful movie to watch, the love and friendship are beautifully treated. Great music and two girls play very well.

a beautiful story and a beautiful relationship between the teen girls, a very touching way to understand the love and friendship. every picture likes a poetry, surrounding by pretty young girls and their pure wounder.  the music is also very speical
Excellent movie for girls and family to watch. English subtitled, suitable for those who are learning chinese language too.
